name: The Wacky World of Mother Goose
summary: Animated feature film based on Charles Perrault's stories and nursery rhymes. It features Humpty Dumpty, The Old Woman Who Lives in a Shoe, and the Crooked Man.
info:
• 原作: Arthur Rankin Jr.
  • 导演: Jules Bass
  • 脚本: Romeo Muller
  • 上映年度: 1967年9月27日
  • 片长: 81min
  • 语言: 英语
